#pragma config(Sensor, S4,     ultra,               sensorSONAR)
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//
#define THRESHOLD 50 
task main()
{
int degree;

float angle = 180.0;
float radius = 2.8;
float axis_h = 11.4/2.0;
float a,b,num;

degree = (int)( axis_h / radius * angle );

nxtDisplayTextLine( 0, "%d", degree );


nMotorEncoder[motorA] =0;
nMotorEncoder[motorB] =0;

motor[ motorA ] = 10;
motor[ motorB ] = -10;

while (SensorValue(ultra) > THRESHOLD);
a=nMotorEncoder[motorA];
PlaySound( soundBeepBeep );
while(SensorValue(ultra) < THRESHOLD);

while(SensorValue(ultra) > THRESHOLD);
b=nMotorEncoder[motorA];
while(SensorValue(ultra) < THRESHOLD);

  PlaySound( soundBeepBeep );


//num = (b-a)/2.0;
num = b-a;
  /*
degree2 = (int)( axis_h / radius * num );
nMotorEncoder[motorA] =0;
nMotorEncoder[motorB] =0;
*/

motor[ motorA ] = -10;
motor[ motorB ] = 10;

while(1){
  if( nMotorEncoder[ motorA ] <= num){
    PlaySound( soundBeepBeep );
    motor[ motorA ] = 30;
    motor[ motorB ] = 30;
}
}

//nxtDisplayTextLine( 0, "%d", nMotorEncoder[ motorB ] );


}
